trends: There has been one other sighting in Lomita
There were no other sightings in Lomita on or around November 16th 2001
Summary: Four light disks embeded in a dark grey or black t
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking to the Northwest, Witness #2 saw four lights in a triangle formation. The lights appeared to be embedded in a black-grey triangle shapedobject.Witness #2 alerted Witness #1 and #3 and drew their attention to thesighting.They confirmed the size and shape of the object as it passed overhead,and visually followed the object as it headed in a southeast direction. It madevery little to no noise as it travelled directly overhead.Witness #2, a licensedpilot, estimated crafts speed at 300 miles per hour. Shortly thereafter, about3 minutes, a two fighter formation could be seen following the path of theobject.
